resources.string:
1. Press the "Find network button."

 A new window will pop up. 

 2. In this window, search for the wifi network called "SmartQuilt" and connect to it. 

 Done, you may now continue using the app.
Steps to connecting to your Quilt.
Connection Failed, Please try again or check if the network "SmartQuilt" \n\n appears on your list of available wifi connections.
Wifi is off, please turn your wifi then try again.
